java/liquibase/ant/GenerateChangeLogTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.diff.Diff;
00005 import liquibase.diff.DiffResult;
00006 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00007 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00008 
00009 import java.io.PrintStream;
00010 
00011 public class GenerateChangeLogTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00012 
00013     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00014         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00015         try {
00016             PrintStream writer = createPrintStream();
00017             if (writer == null) {
00018                 throw new BuildException("generateChangeLog requires outputFile to be set");
00019             }
00020 
00021             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00022 
00023             Database database = liquibase.getDatabase();
00024             Diff diff = new Diff(database, getDefaultSchemaName());
00025 //            diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00026             DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00027 
00028             diffResult.printChangeLog(writer, database);
00029 
00030             writer.flush();
00031             writer.close();
00032         } catch (Exception e) {
00033             throw new BuildException(e);
00034         } finally {
00035             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00036         }
00037     }
00038 }
